Uses of Class
gameticket_package.game

    • Uses of game in gameticket_package

      Subclasses of game in gameticket_package 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  internationalgame
      INHERITANCE is applied here where the international game is inherited from the abstract class game
      class  nationalgame
      INHERITANCE is applied here where the national game is inherited from the abstract class game
      Methods in gameticket_package with parameters of type game 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void game.buyticket(java.lang.String categ, seat a, game g)
      This method actually reserves the seat of a certain category in certain match by checking the category of the seat you want to reserve if it still exists through interface availability and also takes the match you want to reserve ticket in you want to reserve ticket in and increase the static number of seats when reserved
      void sportfan.buyticket(java.lang.String categ, seat a, game g)
      This method allows a sport fan to reserve a ticket of certain match and certain category
      java.lang.Boolean game.cancelticket(int num, game g, java.lang.String categ)
      OVERLOADING is applied here where this method is used when user wants to update his category so it cancels the old reservation and reserve a new one in same match but different seat category
      java.lang.Boolean game.cancelticket(int num, int datex, int m, game g, java.lang.String categ)
      This method cancels the ticket reservation by checking first if this ticket is bought first then checking if the date is before the match by more than three days and cancel the reservation and decrements the static counter of reserved seats in each category
      void sportfan.cancelticket(int num, int date, int m, game g, java.lang.String categ)
      This method allows sport fan to cancel a ticket reservation and minimise the number of reserved tickets again also checks if the seat is reserved and the date is before the match by more than 3 days as it passes the information to the delete method in the game class
      void sportfan.makebet(game g, java.lang.String win, java.lang.String betprice)
      Calculated data member is applied here This class takes the amount of money that user wants to make a bet with and if he won the bet his money is duplicated else his money will be lost on him
      void sportfan.upgrade(int num, game g, java.lang.String categ, seat a, java.lang.String categupdate)
      This method upgrades the seat that the user wants
